channel.title: Help
channel.description: how do i make it so theres snow on the ground in my 508 client??

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:
@mod_jesus wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:324874”]there is a flo.dat

use toms cache suite to dump it and edit it from there.[/quote]

tbh i dont know what toms cache suite is lol

if u can i need a dl link for it lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

there is a flo.dat

use toms cache suite to dump it and edit it from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:
@mod_jesus wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:324874”][quote author=mod jesus link=topic=421233.msg3093822#msg3093822 date=1263105105]

You’d have to find the Flo class in the 508 client (Don’t know which one it is.)

Then you’d just do something along the lines of

if(colorVariable == colorIduWantChanged){ colourVariable = urcolor; }

how would i know if its the flo class?
[/quote]

…

flo.dat is the file that handles the ground colors and tile configs…[/quote]

there is no fucking flo.dat!!! y would i ask if there was 1!

Read full topic
